org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.runtime.irunit

Class IRUnitDriver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.iterativereduce.runtime.irunit.IRUnitDriver<T>

  • public class IRUnitDriver<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A very basic way to simulate an IterativeReduce application in order to simply develop/test a new parallel iterative algorithm. Does not simulate the Avro plumbing.
